Disclaimers

Important Notice: This platform contains cultural content that may be sensitive or sacred to indigenous communities. Please use this resource respectfully and in accordance with our guidelines.

Cultural Sensitivity Disclaimer

The Indigenous Art Atlas acknowledges that some content on this platform may be of cultural or spiritual significance to Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples and other indigenous communities worldwide. We recognize that:

  • Some artworks may have restricted viewing or cultural protocols
  • Traditional knowledge and cultural practices require respectful handling
  • Indigenous communities are the primary custodians of their cultural heritage
  • Cultural interpretation should involve appropriate community representatives

We strive to work collaboratively with indigenous communities to ensure appropriate representation and protection of cultural materials.

Content and Accuracy Disclaimer

User-Generated Content

Content on this platform is contributed by users from the community. While we moderate submissions and provide guidelines, we cannot guarantee:

  • Complete accuracy of all location information
  • Verification of all cultural or historical claims
  • Authentication of artwork attribution
  • Current accessibility or condition of documented sites

Educational Purpose

Information provided is for educational and cultural preservation purposes. Users should:

  • Verify information independently for academic or commercial use
  • Consult with local communities for cultural context
  • Respect access restrictions and private property rights
  • Follow appropriate cultural protocols when visiting sites

Legal Disclaimers

Limitation of Liability

The Indigenous Art Atlas and its operators are not liable for:

  • Damages resulting from use of location information
  • Injury or trespass occurring while visiting documented sites
  • Loss or damage to personal property
  • Consequences of inappropriate use of cultural information

Copyright and Intellectual Property

Users are responsible for ensuring they have appropriate rights to:

  • Photograph and share artwork images
  • Provide cultural or historical information
  • Grant usage permissions for submitted content
  • Respect traditional knowledge and protocols

Privacy and Data Protection

While we implement security measures to protect user data and sensitive location information:

  • Users share location and cultural information at their own discretion
  • No system can guarantee complete data security
  • Sensitive information may be visible to other users despite privacy settings
  • Users should consider cultural implications before sharing

Access and Safety

Site Access

Important: Many documented sites may be:

  • Located on private property requiring permission to access
  • In remote or dangerous locations
  • Subject to environmental or cultural access restrictions
  • Protected by law with penalties for unauthorized access

Safety Considerations

Users visiting documented sites do so at their own risk. Consider:

  • Weather conditions and seasonal access restrictions
  • Wildlife, terrain, and environmental hazards
  • Emergency communication and navigation requirements
  • Local regulations and permit requirements

Platform Usage

Service Availability

This platform is provided "as is" without warranty. We cannot guarantee:

  • Continuous availability of services
  • Compatibility with all devices or browsers
  • Permanent preservation of all user data
  • Maintenance of current feature sets

Modification of Terms

These disclaimers and our terms of service may be updated periodically. Users are responsible for reviewing current terms before use.

Contact and Resolution

For questions about these disclaimers, cultural concerns, or to report inappropriate content, please contact us through our official channels. We are committed to working with communities to address concerns respectfully and appropriately.

Acknowledgment

By using this platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by these disclaimers and our community guidelines. You also acknowledge the cultural significance of indigenous art and commit to respectful engagement with this material.
